Title: Requires certain candidates to file a statement attesting to the veracity of statements regarding the candidate's educational history, and service, employment and residency record
Summary: Requires certain candidates to file a statement attesting to the veracity of statements regarding the candidate's educational history, and service, employment and residency record; provides for the filing of amended statements; provides penalties.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to requiring certain candidates to file a statement attesting to the veracity of statements regarding the candidate's educational history, and service, employment and residency record
